title: FA Frenzy Continues + Snap Goblin Returns, Watson Watch! - Fantasy Football Podcast for 3/17
description:
The Fantasy Footballers are back with a new episode! On today’s fantasy football podcast, the free agent frenzy continues! What’s the fantasy football impact of the latest signings? Plus, the winner of a listener league spot is announced and Deshaun Watson watch! Follow now for fantasy content all offseason! Manage your redraft, keeper, and dynasty fantasy football teams with the #1 fantasy football podcast. -- Fantasy Football Podcast for March 17th, 2022.

The 2022 UDK is available for pre-order at UltimateDraftKit.com -- Get instant access to the Dynasty Pass with the UDK+

(05:00) - Free Agent Frenzy
(05:10) - Deshaun Watson
(13:00) - J.D. McKissic, Antonio Gibson
(18:20) - Julio Jones
(20:05) - Buccaneers: Chris Godwin, Russell Gage, Breshad Perriman
(22:00) - Browns: Austin Hooper, Harrison Bryant, Baker Mayfield
(27:35) - Dolphins: Raheem Mostert, Trent Sherfield 
(30:10) - Bills: Cole Beasley, O.J. Howard, Dawson Knox
(36:35) - Giants: Ricky Seals-Jones, Tyrod Taylor
(37:40) - Texans: Dare Ogunbowale, Royce Freeman
(39:20) - James White
(39:55) - D’Onta Foreman

Connect with the show:
Subscribe on YouTube

Support the Show
Follow on Twitter
Follow on Instagram
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
